entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
